articles.title: Combination 'polypill' lowers the risk of major cardiovascular events, study finds - CNN
articles.description: Older heart disease patients who took a combination "polypill" made up of three different medications had a lower risk of major cardiovascular events, according to a new study published Friday in the New England Journal of Medicine and presented at the Europe…
